ðŸ“– Summary: Laplace enables screen sharing via browser using WebRTC for low-latency peer-to-peer connections and a Golang-based WebSocket for signaling. It offers a simple, installation-free solution for screen sharing with low server costs, ideal for various use cases including game streaming and remote collaboration.
